heading: HR00666
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE FINDINGS OF THE UN ENVIRONMENT PROGRAM (UNEP) ON ANNUAL SEVERE BLEACHING (ASB) DUE TO CLIMATE CHANGE THAT THREATENS THE WORLD'S CORAL REEFS, INCLUDING THOSE IN THE PHILIPPINES AND RECOMMEND COUNTERMEASURES IN ORDER TO PUT THE PHENOMENON IN CHECK
status: Pending with the Committee on CLIMATE CHANGE since 2017-01-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00666
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE FINDINGS OF THE UN ENVIRONMENT PROGRAM (UNEP) ON ANNUAL SEVERE BLEACHING (ASB) DUE TO CLIMATE CHANGE THAT THREATENS THE WORLD'S CORAL REEFS, INCLUDING THOSE IN THE PHILIPPINES AND RECOMMEND COUNTERMEASURES IN ORDER TO PUT THE PHENOMENON IN CHECK
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2017-01-10
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON CLIMATE CHANGE ON 2017-01-24
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-01-16;
